descriptionHtml:
[center]Okay so i am new to this so please bear with me here anyways i decided it was time to try and make my own mod and this is what i came up with. Sorry if i confuse anyone i have never uploaded a mod before i'm kinda learning as i go along.

[b][u]Description﻿
[/u][/b] This mod adds a new follower to the game a wood elf called Noruinir. He will level up with your character and is immortal. Specializes in Archery and knows a few spells but not many. Also he you will come in regular farm clothes so can choose what armor you would like to put him in.
Also if you are wondering what armor he is using in the 2 pictures it is the Crimson Ranger Armor which i happened to have downloaded at the time[/center]              [center]﻿[b][u]Location
[/u][/b]You can find him at the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood

Requirements 
Latest Skyrim Patch
In order for this mod to work you must have Apachii Sky hair V1.5 just the main one (i think) installed.

Recommended Download (Maybe)
I also might recommended having Better Males By Chris57 and High Res Face Maps for Men by Geonox if you want him to look as he does in the pictures.[/center]
author: WonderlandProject
